data.name: Hyperstar
data.detailed_description:
Explore the Hyperstar Galaxy

Welcome to the Hyperstar galaxy, a region of space overcome by the Sentinel, a warmongering artificial intelligence army. We have just received the coordinates of an ancient power which is our last hope in defending our civilization. Your mission, Pilot, is to travel across the Hyperstar galaxy and rebuild these powerful and ancient starships before the Sentinel destroys all that we have left.

Expand Your Arsenal

Collect resources to reconstruct powerful starships and bring their power to life. Augment your starships with powerful upgrades and strategize your attack on the Sentinel. Unlock special perks to create a unique play style.

Key Features

  • Combat relentless enemies and bosses
  • Pilot powerful starships and master their unique attacks
  • Explore immersive space environments
  • Score hunt in scripted gauntlets to put your skills to the test

data.short_description: A challenging and action-packed 2D survival shooter. Defend yourself from dangerous enemies by piloting ancient starships, each armed with unique and powerful weaponry.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Modern Dual Core CPU or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 10+ capable
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1300X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 or greater
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A dedicated video card is highly recommended. A quality processor is more important for overall performance than the video card.
